column4: so when i installed ubuntu i had all sorts of fancy effects now i can't make the system have wobbly windows i tried enabling visual effects but it says it can't but why could it before i upgraded?
is there a way to change that?
make sure you have your graphics drivers installed properly
is there a wway to reinstall them?
yes, do you have ATI or NVIDIA
it says i have no propietary drivers installed
check out System -> Preferences -> Hardware Drivers
do you see any drivers listed?
do a sudo apt-get update
and upgrade
i am on 9.04
i installed the updates and such and i still can't enable visual effects
check System -> Preferences -> Hardware Drivers again to see if its listed
there are still no drivers
do 'lspci  grep VGA' and see which video card you have
lspci | grep VGA
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960 Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 03)
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/compiz/+bug/363821/comments/7
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=7132843#post7132843
i'm opening the first one
any luck?
